name: Lijo Acha
wishText: We are So grateful for having a uncle like you
text1: It's your 10th year of priestly life!!!
textInChatBox: Happy ordination....Enjoy your day.Wishes from TAS.yeeee ...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.(i am sorry i couldnt get a better photo of you)
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.Made with love by TomsMater(Thomas) For our super uncle.
